DOC.detailed_description: The investigator review video-recordings three randomize control trial ( NCT01535326 , 01699399 , 01894191 ) compare air insufflation , water immersion water exchange . These study conduct Buddhist Dalin Tzu Chi Hospital . Permission obtain local Institutional Review Board ( IRB ) review , analyze report de-identified finding . Two experienced endoscopists ( YHH CWT ) perform recorded colonoscopy .
